Sweater and vest sizing based on Standard Body Measurements published by Craft Yarn Council.

Sweater and vest size dimensions are finished size. Sweaters and vests are straight hip-length garments. Sweaters have drop shoulders and tapered sleeves. Use less yarn for fitted garments and more yarn for longer garments.
Blanket and scarf measurements are finished size. Add more yarn for tassels.
Toque and Tam measurements are head size, not garment size.
Yarn estimates based on calculations by The Inquisitive Introvert.
